EventsData.title: Tech Innovation Summit
EventsData.description: A gathering of tech entrepreneurs, investors, and industry leaders to discuss innovation and growth opportunities in East Africa.

EventsData.title: Digital Arts Exhibition
EventsData.description: A hands-on workshop focused on building digital skills for youth and entrepreneurs.

EventsData.title: Youth Leadership Workshop
EventsData.description: Interactive workshop focused on developing leadership skills, public speaking, and community organizing for youth leaders.

EventsData.title: Digital Bridge Graduation
EventsData.description: Celebration ceremony for graduates of the Digital Bridge program, recognizing their achievements in digital skills development.

EventsData.title: Mombasa County Youth Leader Association
EventsData.description: Networking event for youth leaders across Mombasa County to collaborate on community initiatives and share best practices.

EventsData.title: Uefa Champions League Finals Watch Party
EventsData.description: Community viewing of the UEFA Champions League Finals. Join fellow football enthusiasts for this exciting sporting event.

EventsData.title: Governor Issa Timamy Session
EventsData.description: Special session with Governor Issa Timamy discussing regional development initiatives and opportunities for youth engagement.

EventsData.title: Department Summit
EventsData.description: Strategic planning summit for department heads to align on organizational goals and initiatives for the upcoming year.

EventsData.title: Info Session Generation
EventsData.description: Informational session about upcoming Generation programs and opportunities for skills development and career advancement.

EventsData.title: Peer Counselling Club ReLaunch
EventsData.description: Relaunch event for the Peer Counselling Club, introducing new initiatives and recruiting members to support mental health awareness.

EventsData.title: Konga Za Utamaduni
EventsData.description: Cultural celebration showcasing traditional music, dance, and art from the coastal region of Kenya.

EventsData.title: International Day For Menstrual Hygiene
EventsData.description: Educational event raising awareness about menstrual hygiene and promoting access to menstrual products for all.

EventsData.title: Make Music Day
EventsData.description: Community music festival celebrating the universal language of music with performances from local artists and interactive workshops.
